dcterms:creator: M. R. Alam
L. Yao
dcterms:description: The Long-Term Pavement Performance (LTPP) data is utilized to determine the optimum type and timing of maintenance and rehabilitation practices, serving as a comprehensive dataset for evaluating pavement performance indicators such as International Roughness Index (IRI) and Rutting Depth (RD).
dcterms:title: Long-Term Pavement Performance (LTPP) data

dcterms:creator: L. Yao
dcterms:description: The LTPP data is referenced multiple times in the context of secondary indicators, data quality improvement, and environmental and economic impacts, highlighting its significance in long-term pavement maintenance planning.
dcterms:title: LTPP data
